inputs.selection_motivation: During the March–April 2024 Fed rate‑hike cycle, the 5Y Treasury yield spiked, compressing equity valuations and driving the S&P 500 lower.
inputs.candidate_motivation: US 5Y Treasury Yield is directly shaped by Fed policy, inflation expectations, and the U.S. Treasury term structure, and it is strongly correlated with global yields, currency indices, equity markets, and commodity prices that feed into inflation dynamics.

proposed_link.motivation: During the March–April 2024 Fed rate‑hike cycle, the 5Y Treasury yield spiked, compressing equity valuations and driving the S&P 500 lower.
